content: end of row row 4 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 pro tip your yarns will get very twisted in row 1 pull about 24 60cm of yarn out of each ball pro tip you may wish to place a removable prior to knitting row 1 so that the working stitch marker on the rs of your fabric this can help you remember which row you re on 🙂 yarns have room to twist and untwist in row 2 note in row 1 and row 2 work each color as it repeat row 3 and row 4 73 more times appears being sure to bring the new color up 150 total row 80 sts from below for each stitch note this section should use about half of your row 1 ws wrapping cc around mc *k1 mc skein with cc bring mc under cc k1 with mc bring cc under mc* repeat from * to * until end of row row 2 rs wrapping mc around cc *p1 with mc bring cc under mc p1 with cc bring mc under cc* repeat from * to * until end of row sunmelt shawlette 3 pattern by rachael huffman of moonvale creations this pattern is available for free and should not be sold section 3 sunset lace section 4 waves at sunset note for a larger shawl instead of a shawlette note if you prefer to work from a chart please you can simply knit more repeats of section 3 turn to page 6 and section 4 note due to the growing shawl edge the three switch to cc cut mc repeats of this section have different until last setup row ws k3 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 … sts directions below denoted by row and repeat number row 1 rs k1 kfb k1 yo *skp k2tog yo twice* repeat from * to * until last 10 sts switch to mc cut cc skp k2tog yo k3 k2tog k1 setup row ws k3 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 2 k6 p2 *k1 into first yo ktbl into row 1 rs k1 kfb *k3 k2tog 4 times second yo p2* repeat from * to * until k3 yo k1 4 times* repeat from * to * last 5 sts k3 kfb k1 until last 18 sts k3 k2tog 4 times yo k1 row 3 k1 kfb k1 p3 *c2b p2* repeat 4 times k2tog k1 from * to * until last 4 sts k1 k2tog k1 2nd repeat k1 kfb *k3 k2tog 4 times row 4 k3 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * k3 yo k1 4 times* repeat from * to * until last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 until last 5 sts k2 k2tog k1 row 5 k1 kfb k1 k2tog *yo twice skp 3rd repeat k1 kfb *k3 k2tog 4 times k2tog* repeat from * to * until last 6 sts k3 yo k1 4 times* repeat from * to * yo twice
